game.name: Loot & Ledger
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Run your own medieval store! Stock shelves with groceries and legendary loot, set prices, serve customers, and expand your shop. Fund adventurers to explore dangerous lands and return with valuable chests full of swords, shields, and rare items and all without leaving the counter.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run your own medieval store! Stock shelves with groceries and legendary loot, set prices, serve customers, and expand your shop. Fund adventurers to explore dangerous lands and return with valuable chests full of swords, shields, and rare items and all without leaving the counter.
